ChangeNotes.Value: Fix: Not safe quest state setting. And crashes related to it. Fix: Key not found exception, when revenger party is already removed. Fix: Null exception, when all notables have left the village to for the revenge. If village has one notable, he will not initiate the revenge from now. Feature: Added configuration parameter peasantRevengePartyWaitLordDistance. Notable peasant's party will wait for player to initiate dialogue at this distance. Feature: Added dialogue option to return from revenger peasant persuasion options into main hero options. Feature: Added dialogue option to delay interaction with revenger. Fix: Null exception, when prisoner is released and party is null
